overview: The way a man relates to another man can be pretty unpredictable and capricious. It often depends on the situation where expected attitudes can change unexpectedly and so spontaneity is the best route to take. And sometimes it's just fun to assume a role to fit the scene.
tagline: Huge hung Mac Reynolds and Scott Baldwin star with a cast of sex-sational superstars that includes Shane Slater, Alec Powers and more, in non-stop action that will leave you breathless.
title: Man To Men
